projects.name: Portfolio2.0
projects.shortDescription: A light weight responsive portfolio website based on Bulma and React JS
projects.longDescription: After one year I re-build my portfolio again with React, I removed the unnecessary parts of the contents and added more graphic motion in CSS to make it more vividly and lively. The new one was built with more functional components to boost the efficiency. Compared to the portfolio1.0 I built last year, this codes quality was improved a lot.

projects.name: Yes We Stock Internship
projects.shortDescription: An front-end internship in a startup.
projects.longDescription: Devote to a startup as my first step into the web development industry was an interesting experience, during the three months I worked in a co-working space call Camden Collective near London Euston station where were more than 50 start-ups worked there and waited for the coming pitch opportunities to become the next unicorn. Please click the demo to read more what I did during the internsihp :)

projects.name: Portfolio1.0
projects.shortDescription: Full responsive portfolio website based on React JS
projects.longDescription: This is my first React JS project, all the contents of this website are based on different JSON files. The visual design style is modified from Google material design, and the components are modified based on React-Boostrap.

projects.name: Attendance UI
projects.shortDescription: A web interface of an attendance system.
projects.longDescription: A web interface of an attendance system, it fetches the employee's daily logs of entering and leaving times from database, calculates the average working hours within a month or a year, and shows the statics in the table or the line chart. It also provides search features to search specific data of the employee or the year.

projects.name: Elegance
projects.shortDescription: Single page website design with elegant black scheme.
projects.longDescription: Front-end website design as a modern style landing page template. Powered by Bulma and Animate.CSS.

projects.name: Todo App
projects.shortDescription: Simple To-Do App. Implentating props and states of React JS
projects.longDescription: A simple To-Do App. User can add new tasks and hide completed ones. Not using server side so it will reset after reloading the page.

projects.name: Slides
projects.longDescription: A modern design slide gallery based on jQuery, included information icon to know more about stories behind each picture. Fully responsive.

projects.name: Message Board
projects.shortDescription: Based on PHP, MySQL and AJAX.
projects.longDescription: A simple message board based on PHP, MySQL and AJAX, users can leave any message on this simple full resopnsive webpage.

projects.name: Zoo Album
projects.shortDescription: Simple album based on Handlebar JS
projects.longDescription: The album is based on JSON files to read all the pictures and categories. With filter features, user can change the category of the animals. Fully responsive to different platforms and with clean design style. This is an exercise based on the Responsive Web Design course on Coursera by Goldsmiths, University of London.

projects.name: Mario Game
projects.shortDescription: A classic action game made in P5 JS
projects.longDescription: Based on p5 JS and p5 play js, the game is controlled by arrow-keys. The game scrolls automatically and includes classic mario music and sound effects, player can experience a different mario game to the original one.
